title: Abnormal findings on diagnostic imaging of heart and coronary circulation
chapter: Symptoms, signs and abnormal clinical and laboratory findings, not elsewhere classified
block: Abnormal findings on diagnostic imaging and in function studies, without diagnosis
category: Abnormal findings on diagnostic imaging of other body structures

nonspecific abnormal findings on diagnostic imaging by: ultrasound [echogram]
nonspecific abnormal findings on diagnostic imaging by: X-ray examination
exclusion: abnormal findings on antenatal screening of mother
certain conditions originating in the perinatal period
abnormal findings on antenatal screening of mother
diagnostic abnormal findings classified elsewhere - see Alphabetical Index
